glsa.title: Audacity: User-assisted execution of arbitrary code
glsa.synopsis: A boundary error in Audacity allows for the execution of arbitrary code.

background.p: Audacity is a free cross-platform audio editor.

description.p: Houssamix discovered a boundary error in the String_parse::get_nonspace_quoted() function in lib-src/allegro/strparse.cpp.

impact.p: A remote attacker could entice a user into importing a specially crafted *.gro file, resulting in the execution of arbitrary code or a Denial of Service.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Audacity users should upgrade to the latest version:
